caption.p: 2D-pCF analysis calculated at 8 pixels (640 nm) distance and 6 hours post transfection. ( a) Average intensity for the time series of a nucleus in a BHK cell transfected with C-mCherry. ( b) Connectivity map represented with lines in the corresponding angle of higher anisotropy. ( c) Average intensity of the series of frames superimposed with connectivity map. ( d) Average intensity, ( e) connectivity map and ( f) connectivity map merged with intensity for the nucleus of a cell transfected with fluorescent protein mCherry.
